channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware Tanzu -- Concourse
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware Tanzu -- Concourse

item.title: CVE-2020-5415|2024-09-16T17:53:07.446Z -- vmware%20tanzu -- concourse
item.description: Concourse, versions prior to 6.3.1 and 6.4.1, in installations which use the GitLab auth connector, is vulnerable to identity spoofing by way of configuring a GitLab account with the same full name as another user who is granted access to a Concourse team. GitLab groups do not have this vulnerability, so GitLab users may be moved into groups which are then configured in the Concourse team.
